response.original_title: TAEYANG - 2017 WORLD TOUR  [WHITE NIGHT] IN SEOUL
response.overview: The White Night World Tour is the second world tour by South Korean singer Taeyang. The tour began in Japan with four stadium shows and is set to visit 19 cities worldwide.  Setlist  01. INTRO  02. 링가링가 (RINGA LINGA)  03. MENT #1  04. 아름다워 (BODY)  05. SUPERSTAR  06. VIDEO #1  07. WAKE ME UP  08. 나만바라봐 (JUST LOOK AT ME)  09. 웨딩드레스 (WEDDING DRESS)  10. MENT #2  11. AMAZIN'  12. 새벽한시 (1AM) + BAND JAM  13. NAKED  14. SO GOOD  15. MENT #3 + I NEED A GIRL  16. 텅빈도로 (EMPTY ROAD)  17. RIDE  18. VIDEO #2  19. 오늘밤 (TONIGHT)  20. LOVE YOU TO DEATH  21. 겁 (FEAR) (FEAT. MINO)  22. LAST DANCE  23. MENT #4  24. DARLING  25. BREAK DOWN (ENCORE)  26. GOOD BOY (ENCORE)  27. STAY WITH ME (ENCORE)  28. MENT #5 (ENCORE)  29. SUPERSTAR (RE-ENCORE)  30. BANG BANG BANG (RE-ENCORE)  31. FANTASTIC BABY (RE-ENCORE)  32. MENT #6 (RE-ENCORE)  33. 눈, 코, 입 (EYES, NOSE, LIPS) (RE-ENCORE)
response.title: TAEYANG - 2017 WORLD TOUR  [WHITE NIGHT] IN SEOUL
